pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiverse Analyses for Conditioning Data // A suite of functions for performing analyses, based on a multiverse approach, for conditioning data. Specifically, given the appropriate data, the functions are able to perform t-tests, analyses of variance, and mixed models for the provided data and return summary statistics and plots. The function is also able to return for all those tests p-values, confidence intervals, and Bayes factors. The methods are described in Lonsdorf, Gerlicher, Klingelhofer-Jens, Krypotos (2022) doi:10.1016/j.brat.2022.104072.
